text: Inhambanella is a group of trees in the Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1915.Tropicos, Inhambanella (Engl.) Dubard Dubard, Marcel Marie Maurice. 1915. Annales du Musée Colonial de Marseille, sér. 3, 3: 43 The genus is endemic to Africa.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;species #Inhambanella guereensis (Aubrév. & Pellegr.) T.D.Penn. \- Ivory Coast, Liberia #Inhambanella henriquezii (Engl. & Warb.) Dubard \- Kenya, Tanzania, Malawi, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, KwaZulu-Natal ;formerly included Inhambanella natalensis (Schinz) Dubard, synonym of Vitellariopsis marginata (N.E.Br.) Aubrév. ==References== Category:Sapotaceae Category:Sapotaceae genera Category:Flora of Africa
title: Inhambanella
